items.summary: In `frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.tsx`, update the Love Letter section heading text from "My Dearest Love" to exactly "Meri Makhan Mishri", and render a cute floating heart next to the heading with a gentle looping animation that matches the siteâ€™s soft cinematic style.
